mean_cn: vi. 沉湎于感情，感伤；  vt. 使伤感，因…而伤感
mean_en: to describe or show (something) in an emotional way that makes it seem more attractive or interesting than it really is :to describe or show (something) in a sentimental way
word_etyma: sentimental多愁善感的 + ize动词后缀 → sentimentalize 伤感
sentence: The girls like to watch sad movies and sentimentalize.
sentence_trans: 女孩儿们喜欢看悲剧电影，然后跟着感伤。
